metadata.title: CVE-2024-46478 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
HTMLDOC v1.9.18 contains a buffer overflow in parse_prefunction,ps-pdf.cxx:5681.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-46478` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.9.18-1ubuntu0.1
htmldoc-common - 1.9.18-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.18-1ubuntu0.1').
